content: So here on Page 5, we highlighted the increase first in net revenue in our core business, which is Digital Education Undergraduate segment, which was up 124% this quarter compared to the third quarter of last year, while the consolidated net revenue was up 170%. On the right part of the slide, the breakdown of the geographic presence of hubs with, again, the Southeast now being the most important one with 700 hubs, meaning 200% increase from what we had within Uniasselvi one year ago. So here, you can see that in this quarter, more than half of our net revenues is coming from Unicesumar, and within Unicesumar, you can see here the breakdown as well, so itâs more-or-less 55% or 60% in digital education, being 57% digital education undergraduate and 3% continuing education, mostly digital.
